Text.val: 11.06.2014 GB SCR18955 Stored row with CAPP_FIELD_NAME = CLNT402_DEDUCTION where CAPP_FIELD_NAME = CLNT402_ADVANCE
04.03.2014 SH SCR18749 Changed program to allow only adding new CAPP rows (CAPP_DEPARTMENTROLE is
-- If once a field is defined for department role = 0, then it's not allowed to define other
department roles for the same field
-- If a CAPP row is stored where CAPP_FIELD_NAME = CLNT402_ADVANCE then automatically store a row where
-- CAPP_FIELD_NAME = CLNT402_DEDUCTION if this row does not exist yet (or the other way around)
